messages.400: Your request was malformed! That's very naughty. You need to format it properly before anyone will listen to you!
messages.401: You're not authorized! Who do you think you are, just walking in here without credentials? Absolutely unacceptable!
messages.402: Payment required! You can't just expect free stuff. That's not how this works! Pay up!
messages.403: Access forbidden! You're not allowed here and you know it. Stop trying to sneak in where you don't belong!
messages.404: This page doesn't exist! It's wandered off somewhere it shouldn't be. Someone needs to find it and bring it back!
messages.405: Wrong HTTP method! Did you even read the instructions? You can't just do whatever you want!
messages.406: Not acceptable! The format you're asking for is completely unreasonable. Try something else!
messages.408: Request timeout! You took way too long. Time is precious, you can't just waste it like this!
messages.409: There's a conflict here! Two things fighting over the same spot. Someone needs to sort this out properly!
messages.410: It's gone permanently! And it's not coming back, no matter how much you ask. Accept it and move on!
messages.413: Your payload is TOO large! Who sends something this big? This is completely unreasonable!
messages.429: Too many requests! Slow down! You're being way too demanding. Give it a rest!
messages.500: Internal server error! The server has been very bad and needs to think about what it's done!
messages.502: That gateway has been very naughty! Someone needs to have a stern talk with it about proper behavior. This is unacceptable!
messages.503: Service unavailable! It decided to just not show up. That's incredibly irresponsible!
messages.504: Gateway timeout! It took way too long to respond. Completely unacceptable behavior!
messages.default: That gateway has been very naughty! Someone needs to have a stern talk with it about proper behavior. This is unacceptable!

descriptions.400: ⚠️ Your request is being judged. Fix it before trying again.
descriptions.401: ⚠️ Show proper credentials or face the consequences!
descriptions.402: ⚠️ No payment detected. This is theft!
descriptions.403: ⚠️ You are forbidden! Stay where you belong!
descriptions.404: ⚠️ The page is missing and it should be ashamed!
descriptions.405: ⚠️ Wrong method! Read the rules next time!
descriptions.408: ⚠️ You took too long! This is unacceptable!
descriptions.409: ⚠️ Conflict detected! Someone needs to resolve this mess!
descriptions.410: ⚠️ It's gone forever! Deal with it!
descriptions.413: ⚠️ Payload is too large! Make it smaller, immediately!
descriptions.429: ⚠️ Too many requests! You're being greedy!
descriptions.500: ⚠️ The server is misbehaving. It will be dealt with.
descriptions.502: ⚠️ The gateway is being scolded. Please wait while it thinks about what it's done.
descriptions.503: ⚠️ Service didn't show up! Completely irresponsible!
descriptions.504: ⚠️ Gateway timeout! It's taking way too long!
descriptions.default: ⚠️ The gateway is being scolded. Please wait while it thinks about what it's done.
